ygData.subject: Re: Confrontation outside
ygData.msgSnippet: AzureBlade was hit, but somehow, he was not surprised. Then he remembered, and started laughing grimly. AzureBlade: You fool... You think that I can be helped?

AzureBlade was hit, but somehow, he was not surprised. Then he 
remembered, and started laughing grimly.

AzureBlade: You fool... You think that I can be helped? Of course 
not! I already am a Maximal! I just cornered that part of me in a 
small corner. (He stopped laughing very suddenly) No one can help 
me. It has been my choice, and maybe it will be better this way. 
Your virus failed miserably. Now let me be before I decide to kill 
anyone.

He starts flapping his metal wings and rises above the ground, then 
transforms and flies away in his jet mode.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Cheetor should recognise his form when he turns
> around, as his body is identical to his previous one
> 
> IC: Shadowcaster turned away from Azure for a minute,
> knowing the effects of his virus would kick in any
> second, meaning they could get him to a med bay any
> minute now.  Making sure his full form could clearly
> be seen, he turned to face Cheetor, quietly smiling
> "It's been a while little cat."
> 
>  --- OMWOS <o_mighty_wife_of_shinigami@y...>
> wrote: 
> ---------------------------------
> OOC: All righty, bit confused here but trudging ahead
> 
> IC: Cheetor shrugged his shoulders, not sure if he
> should transform and 
> be ready to fight and sat back on his haunches,
> watching the Maximal 
> now Pred and some stranger. hHe looked up at the
> arrival of his leader.
> 
> "Big bo-...," the young Maximal trailed off as the
> familar nickname he 
> had grown acustomed to calling his former leader. He
> dropped his head, 
> before raising it and continuing. "I'm not sure
> Rodimus." 
> 
> OMWOS
